Name: Chronac
About the game: Welcome to CHRONAC! You become sentient in a facility that tests its combat robots by making them fight each other. Now you must escape your creators... or stay to be tested forever. features: Original art and gameplay brimming with personality. Created mostly by one person. You are pitted against each other in different game modes. Using different weapons and/or bots, try to outwit your opponent! If you decide to escape, be prepared to fight unforgiving enemies. You can escape alone, or bring a friend!
